attributes.action: do everything in his power to find out friend Joker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our friend Joker has disappeared, we implore Gordon Brown to aid us in our search from looking behind the sofa to breaking out the helicopters for a proper search. We are very worried about him and we feel a public enquiry into his disappearance would be lovely.
I've put this in "health, well being and care" because we "care" for him and worry about his "health" and "well being"

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
